name: 3dOverlap
author: AFNI Developers
description: Counts the number of voxels that are nonzero in all input datasets

inputs.description: Save the count of overlaps at each voxel into a dataset with the given prefix
inputs.name: Save Prefix

output-files.description: BRIK file with count of overlaps at each voxel (if -save is used)
output-files.name: Output BRIK file

output-files.description: HEAD file with count of overlaps at each voxel (if -save is used)
output-files.name: Output HEAD file
